ach-: Am not highly motivated to succeed.
Do just enough work to get by.
alt+: Have a good word for everyone.
ang+: Am often in a bad mood.
anx+: Get caught up in my problems.
anx-: Am not easily disturbed by events.
art+: See beauty in things that others might not notice.
art-: Do not enjoy watching dance performances.
ass+: Can talk others into doing things.
ass-: Wait for others to lead the way.
cau-: Like to act on a whim.
con-: Am not bothered by difficult social situations.
emo+: Enjoy examining myself and my life.
emo-: Don't understand people who get emotional.
Experience very few emotional highs and lows.
exc+: Enjoy being part of a loud crowd.
exc-: Would never go hang gliding or bungee jumping.
fri-: Am not really interested in others.
Am hard to get to know.
gre+: Involve others in what I am doing.
Enjoy being part of a group.
ima+: Like to get lost in thought.
imm+: Don't know why I do some of the things I do.
imm-: Am able to control my cravings.
int+: Can handle a lot of information.
int-: Am not interested in abstract ideas.
lib+: Believe that there is no absolute right or wrong.
Believe that criminals should receive help rather than punishment.
lib-: Like to stand during the national anthem.
Believe that too much tax money goes to support artists.
mod-: Make myself the center of attention.
Believe that I am better than others.
mor+: Would never cheat on my taxes.
mor-: Know how to get around the rules.
ord+: Do things according to a plan.
sym-: Try not to think about the needy.
tru+: Think that all will be well.
